Package Pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
Pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
The class Piece is a general representation of a chess piece.
Author:
Nicholas Carchio, Adam Romano

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Piece​(Color color, Type type)
    Creates instance of Piece with the specified color and type.

    Returns the color of a chess piece.

    Returns the number of moves made by a chess piece.

    Returns the type of a chess piece.

    Determines whether user input is valid and moves a chess piece to its desired location.

    • move

      public abstract boolean move​(Cell[][] board, java.lang.String input)
      Determines whether user input is valid and moves a chess piece to its desired location.
      Parameters:
      board - The chess board.
      input - User input from the console.
      Returns:
      True if the move was successful, false otherwise.

    • generateLegalMoves

      public abstract java.util.ArrayList<Cell> generateLegalMoves​(Cell[][] board, Cell start)
      Generates the legal moves for a chess piece at a specified location.
      Parameters:
      board - The chess board.
      start - The starting cell of the chess piece.
      Returns:
      List of cells representing the legal moves for the piece.
